downloadTitle: Test Lab Guide: Demonstrating Forefront Identity Manager 2010 Certificate Management User Smart Card Self-Service
downloadDescription: Demonstrating User Smart Card Self-Service using FIM CM in a test lab.
detailsSection: This document will assist architects, consultants, system engineers, and system administrators in deploying smart cards with Microsoft® Forefront® Identity Manager 2010 Certificate Management in a test lab.  The resulting FIM CM test lab will demonstrate using smart cards with a self-service registration model.
systemRequirementsSection:
Operating Systems:  Windows Server 2008 R2

Microsoft SQL Server 2008 with Service Pack 2

Microsoft Exchange 2010 with Service Pack 1

Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010

Update 1 for Microsoft Forefront Identity Manager 2010

USB Smart Card reader

Gemalto .NET Smart Card
installInstructionSection: Click Download to download this document.
